answers.answer: I have heard of people using vinegar and they say it really helps them. I have never tried it because I do not like vinegar. Although, I have heard of people using cinnamon also.
Previous forum discussion. Go to page 2, scroll down toApple Cider Vinegar? Cinnamon?by WilliamR, Oct 06, 2009 09:01AM

question: I've been hearing a lot about the benefits of vinegar, organic apple cidar vinegar in particular, and how it can help stabilize blood sugar.  I know it has other benefits as well, but I'm curious to see if anyone has used it for blood sugar stabilization, and what results, if any, you got from it.Thanks!Gail
title: Diabetes and Vinegar
